fields.name: Geometry Facial Foam
fields.description: A gentle, pH-balanced cleansing foam that purifies and refreshes skin without stripping moisture. Ideal for daily use to remove impurities and leave skin feeling soft and supple.

fields.name: Geometry Hair Serum
fields.description: A lightweight hair serum formulated with argan oil and keratin to add shine, reduce frizz, and protect against heat damage. Promotes healthy-looking, silky smooth hair.

fields.name: Geometry Sunscreen SPF 50
fields.description: Broad-spectrum SPF 50 sunscreen offering superior protection against UVA/UVB rays. Non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula suitable for all skin types, leaving no white cast.

fields.name: ACNI-DS PLUS Face Wash
fields.description: Gentle cleanser with Glycolic and Salicylic Acid, exfoliates oily and acne-prone skin for clearer, younger-looking skin.

fields.name: Facy Clean Face Wash
fields.description: Vitamin C-enriched cleanser for lasting oil control, skin brightening, acne reduction, and pH balance.

fields.name: GLOFIX Whitening Face Wash
fields.description: Purifying cleanser that removes dull surface cells, reduces blemishes, and promotes brighter, even-toned skin.

fields.name: TIMELESS Whitening Face Wash
fields.description: Deeply cleansing and exfoliating face wash that brightens skin, reduces breakouts, and enhances skin clarity and texture.

fields.name: Globac Face Wash
fields.description: Daily cleanser with Salicylic Acid and Nicotinamide that purifies skin, removes dullness, and enhances brightness.

fields.name: Facyglow Plus Face Wash
fields.description: Face wash for oily and acne-prone skin, deeply cleansing impurities, brightening skin tone, and restoring moisture.

fields.name: Acne Cleaner Cleansing Gel
fields.description: Removes excess oil, impurities, and acne-causing bacteria, leaving skin soft, moisturized, and visibly clear.

fields.name: NI-ACNE Liquid Cleanser
fields.description: Refreshing cleansing water for oily, acne-prone skin. Removes makeup, excess oil, and reduces irritation.

fields.name: FACY GLOW Cream
fields.description: Whitening cream that reduces dark spots, fine lines, and hyperpigmentation. Provides lasting hydration and UV protection.

fields.name: D Silk Whitening Cream
fields.description: Nourishing cream that reduces fine lines and wrinkles while hydrating and smoothing skin tone for face and neck.

fields.name: ZEFLAX Anti Melasma Cream
fields.description: Melasma treatment cream that reduces freckles and dark spots, moisturizes, and promotes radiant, even-toned skin.

fields.name: I TOX Whitening Cream
fields.description: Intensive whitening cream that hydrates deeply, reduces sun-induced hyperpigmentation, and smoothens skin tone.

fields.name: Alovete Plus Moisturizing Cream
fields.description: Deeply moisturizing cream for dry, sensitive skin. Restores lipid barrier and soothes irritation.

fields.name: ARBUTIN-DS Serum
fields.description: Anti-melasma serum with Alpha Arbutin, Vitamin C, and Kojic Acid. Reduces freckles and enhances radiance.

fields.name: Facy Acney Gel
fields.description: Fast-acting acne treatment gel. Reduces redness, inflammation, and breakouts with targeted application.

fields.name: D White Whitening Soap
fields.description: Soap enriched with Glutathione, Kojic Acid, and Vitamin C for cleansing and whitening the skin.

fields.name: DANGLOW Bar
fields.description: Anti-fungal soap with Ketoconazole & ZPTO that combats fungal infections and protects skin.

fields.name: KCN-BAR
fields.description: Ketoconazole & ZPTO soap that provides effective protection against fungal conditions.

fields.name: Ketofast Bar
fields.description: Therapeutic soap bar that prevents dandruff and fungal infections while gently cleansing.

fields.name: PERTHIN Bar
fields.description: Soap with Permethrin & Aloe Vera for daily moisturizing, protection, and skin care.

fields.name: SCALICE Bar
fields.description: Permethrin & Aloe Vera soap that soothes and hydrates sensitive skin.

fields.name: Perzil Plus Bar
fields.description: Daily use soap that gently cleanses and moisturizes with Aloe Vera & Permethrin.

fields.name: FAST PRO Bar
fields.description: Mild soap for sensitive skin, enriched with Permethrin & Aloe Vera for daily care.

fields.name: PERTHIN Lotion
fields.description: Rich lotion with Permethrin & Cetrimide that moisturizes deeply and firms the skin.

fields.name: Neonate D Baby Soap
fields.description: Gentle soap for baby skin that cleanses, hydrates, and protects against irritation.

fields.name: V-BEST Intimate Hygiene Wash
fields.description: Hygiene wash with lactic acid and tea tree oil to maintain pH and provide daily comfort.

fields.name: DANGLOW Shampoo
fields.description: Strengthening & Protective Shampoo that fortifies and shields hair against chemical and heat damage, leaving it strong, shiny, and smooth.

fields.name: CLEAN UP DS Shampoo
fields.description: Anti-dandruff shampoo designed to repair dull and brittle hair, revive split ends, protect against heat and chemical damage, and restore shine and vitality.

fields.name: MYCO HAIR Long Hair & Anti-Hair Loss Serum
fields.description: Powerful serum enriched with Essential Amino Acids, Organic Argan Oil, Pro-Vitamin B5, and botanical extracts.
